subject: Attention Beneficiary__Ref#N14
body:
Attention Beneficiary__Ref#N140091
This is to notify you that your funds has been programmed for immediate release into your nominated bank but we can not transfer this funds direct to your bank because we are having a little problem with the International Monetary Fund (IMF), so our method of payment is via Diplomatic Courier Service.
Therefore,
 you have 24hours
 to Contact Tony Edward now with your Full names, Address,Phone Number also the name of the airport close to you via email (
tnoydelivey.us376@rediffmail.com
) and also you can call or send him sms with your details at +1 (678-918-5948) for the delivery of your cash consignment box worth (US$1.5m) direct to your home also to give you more details on how to receive your fund.
CONTACT PERSON: TONY EDWARD
POSITION: FOREIGN DELIVERY DEPARTMENT.
E-MAIL: (
tnoydelivey.us376@rediffmail.com
)
CONGRATULATIONS.
Mr FOLASHODUN SHONUBI THE CBN ACTING GOVERNOR
EXECUTIVE GOVERNOR
CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA

subject: Re: Attention Beneficiary__Ref#N14
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite intrigued by this opportunity. Could you please provide more details about the Diplomatic Courier Service? How does it work exactly?

Also, could you explain a bit more about the issue with the Monetary Fund IMF? I'm not very familiar with these financial matters.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Marlon
